text: Ej ahli kitoʙ, pajomʙari mo ʙa suji sumo omad, to dar davrai fatrati pajomʙaron [fosila ʙajni ʙi'sati Iso va Muhammad] [ahkomu omuzahoi ilohiro] ʙa ravsani ʙarojaton ʙajon kunad, ki maʙodo [ruzi qijomat] ʙigued: "Na ʙasoratʙaxse ʙa suroƣamon omad, na ʙimdihandae". Pas, jaqinan, [inak] pajomʙari ʙasoratʙaxs va ʙimdihanda ʙa sujaton omadaast va Alloh taolo ʙar hama ciz tavonost
